member.name: T:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment
member.summary: Supports updates of the current deployment programmatically, and handles on-demand downloading of files. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.ActivationUri
member.summary: Gets the URL used to launch the deployment manifest of the application.
member.returns: A zero-length string if the TrustUrlParameters property in the deployment manifest is false, or if the user has supplied a UNC to open the deployment or has opened it locally. Otherwise, the return value is the full URL used to launch the application, including any parameters.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForDetailedUpdate
member.summary: Performs the same operation as , but returns extended information about the available update.
member.returns: An for the available update.
member.exception: The current application is either not configured to support updates, or there is another update check operation already in progress.
The deployment manifest cannot be downloaded. This exception will appear in the property of the event.
The deployment manifest is corrupted. Regenerate the application's manifest before you attempt to deploy this application to users. This exception will appear in the property of the event.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate
member.summary: Checks to determine whether a new update is available.
member.returns: true if a new update is available; otherwise, false.
member.exception: ClickOnce throws this exception immediately if you call the method while an update is already in progress.
The deployment manifest cannot be downloaded.
The deployment manifest is corrupted. You will likely need to redeploy the application to fix this problem.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync
member.summary: Checks asynchronously to determine whether a new update is available.
member.exception: ClickOnce throws this exception immediately if you call the method while an update is already in progress.
The deployment manifest cannot be downloaded. This exception appears in the property of the event.
The deployment manifest is corrupted. You will likely need to redeploy the application to fix this problem. This exception appears in the property of the event.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsyncCancel
member.summary: Cancels the asynchronous update check.

member.name: E:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when has completed.

member.name: E:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a progress update is available on a call.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentDeployment
member.summary: Returns the current for this deployment.
member.returns: The current deployment.
member.exception: You attempted to call this static property from a non-ClickOnce application.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the deployment for the current running instance of the application.
member.returns: The current deployment version.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DataDirectory
member.summary: Gets the path to the ClickOnce data directory.
member.returns: A string containing the path to the application's data directory on the local disk.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads a set of optional files on demand.
member.param: The named group of files to download. All files marked "optional" in a ClickOnce application require a group name.
member.exception: The parameter is null or zero-length.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads, on demand, a set of optional files in the background.
member.param: The named group of files to download. All files marked "optional" in a ClickOnce application require a group name.
member.exception: The parameter is null or zero-length.
You cannot initiate more than one download of at a time.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Downloads, on demand, a set of optional files in the background, and passes a piece of application state to the event callbacks.
member.param: The named group of files to download. All files marked "optional" in a ClickOnce application require a group name.
An arbitrary object containing state information for the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: The parameter is null or zero-length.
You cannot initiate more than one download of at a time.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsyncCancel(System.String)
member.summary: Cancels an asynchronous file download.
member.param: The named group of files to download. All files marked "optional" in a ClickOnce application require a group name.
member.exception: cannot be null.

member.name: E:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupCompleted
member.summary: Occurs on the main application thread when a file download is complete.

member.name: E:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when status information is available on a file download operation initiated by a call to .

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsFileGroupDownloaded(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the named file group has already been downloaded to the client computer.
member.returns: true if the file group has already been downloaded for the current version of this application; otherwise, false. If a new version of the application has been installed, and the new version has not added, removed, or altered files in the file group, returns true.
member.param: The named group of files to download. All files marked "optional" in a ClickOnce application require a group name.
member.exception: is not a file group defined in the application manifest.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsFirstRun
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is the first time this application has run on the client computer.
member.returns: true if this version of the application has never run on the client computer before; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsNetworkDeployed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current application is a ClickOnce application.
member.returns: true if this is a ClickOnce application; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.TimeOfLastUpdateCheck
member.summary: Gets the date and the time ClickOnce last checked for an application update.
member.returns: The of the last update check.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.Update
member.summary: Starts a synchronous download and installation of the latest version of this application.
member.returns: true if an application has been updated; otherwise, false.
member.exception: The local computer did not grant the application the permission level it requested to execute.
Your ClickOnce deployment is corrupted. For tips on how to diagnose and correct the problem, see Troubleshooting ClickOnce Deployments.
The new deployment could not be downloaded from its location on the network.
The application is currently being updated.

member.name: M:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync
member.summary: Starts an asynchronous download and installation of the latest version of this application.
member.exception: The local computer did not grant this application the permission level it requested to execute.
Your ClickOnce deployment is corrupted. For tips on how to diagnose and correct the problem, see Troubleshooting ClickOnce Deployments.
The new deployment could not be downloaded from its location on the network.

member.summary: Cancels an asynchronous update initiated by .

uses a URI scheme that is not supported by ClickOnce.
